page.title: 14Local Policing,Bitteswell
page.content: P.C Wheelwright came into our school and,we asked him some questions about policing our D block.This is what he told us.The edges of Lutterworth town have the most crime because of the industrial warehouses which have products of high value in them.The police station was built in the early nineteen hundreds.The worst crime Lutterworth has ever had was a murder.There are 16 people that work at Lutterworth police station including the C.I.D man and a police woman.Our 12 squares are patrolled by a panda car and one P.C.The Police make 25-30 arrests a year.The police have a lot of contact with other forces because of borrowing men and equipment.In Lutterworth and the surrounding villages theft and burgularies are the most commom crimes.The police station is open from
